description: This file contains the main frontend implementation of a calculator app built with Flutter. It defines themes, UI layout including display panel and keypad, as well as the core logic for calculator operations such as input handling, calculations, and state management.

classes.name: OceanPalette
classes.description: Defines the color palette for the dark theme of the calculator app, including core accents, surfaces, keypad colors, overlays, and other UI elements.

classes.name: CalculatorApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up the dark theme and containing the home page of the calculator app.

classes.name: CalculatorHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the main calculator display and input logic, including user interactions, display updates, and calculation computations.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: UI component displaying the calculator title and a visual accent line.

classes.name: _DisplayPanel
classes.description: Widget displaying the ongoing expression, current input, and calculation result with animations and styling.

classes.name: _Keypad
classes.description: Widget rendering the calculator keypad with digit, operator, and action buttons arranged in a grid.

classes.name: _CalcButton
classes.description: Represents individual calculator buttons with modern styling and interactive feedback.

classes.name: _CalcButtonSpec
classes.description: Data class specifying properties for calculator buttons, such as label, icon, type, and actions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the application, launching the CalculatorApp widget.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Configures and returns the application's theme data based on the OceanPalette color scheme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the calculator app's main MaterialApp widget with theme, home page, and other configurations.

methods.name: _CalculatorHomePageState
methods.description: Contains the main logic of calculator operations including input handling, calculations, and UI updates.

methods.name: onInput
methods.description: Handles digit and decimal point input by the user.

methods.name: onOperator
methods.description: Sets the current operator (+, -, ×, ÷) and manages ongoing calculation logic.

methods.name: onEquals
methods.description: Performs the calculation based on stored operands and operator, updating the display with the result.

methods.name: onClear
methods.description: Resets the calculator state to initial values.

methods.name: onBackspace
methods.description: Deletes the last character from the current input.

methods.name: onToggleSign
methods.description: Changes the sign of the current input number.

methods.name: _calculate
methods.description: Performs basic arithmetic operations and returns the result as a string.
